title: Stuart Anderson – 2022 Comments on the Conservative Leadership Contest
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Stuart Anderson, the Conservative MP for Wolverhampton South West, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content: Currently, people are contacting me regarding who I am backing as the next Conservative party leader and Prime Minister. As an Assistant Government Whip, I am unable to share my views. I will maintain impartiality at all times – it is my duty to remain neutral.
